actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for the coverage of certain clinical psychologists' services under the supplementary medical insurance benefits program established by part B of such title.

summary.text: Provides for the coverage of clinical psychologists' services under the supplementary medical insurance benefits program established by title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for the coverage of certain clinical psychologists' services under the supplementary medical insurance benefits program established by part B of such title.
